document_data.mainbody:
Fenten was a dwarf who lived in Baldurs Gate during the midâ€“14 century DR.
He wore a suit of chainmail armor and wielded a battleaxe in combat.
He was an acquaintance of the ranger Gerde.
In the , Fenten helped Gerde cull the ankheg infestation that sprung up at a farm on the southern bank of the River Chionthar, just beyond Wyrms Crossing.
